title: English subtitles for Solino.2002.DVDRip.XviD.avi
description:
Proper subtitles for the XviD version of Solino, also available here on Pirate Bay: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6307721/Solino.2002.DVDRip.XviD.avi

All the other ones I found were either out of sync or contained an extremely bad translation. So I found one with a good translation and simply fixed the sync. 

This is a very good movie, so I hope you enjoy it and benefit from these subtitles. Just leave a comment if you find any problems.
